answers.answer: Your last sentence is correct. HCV negative will be for Hep C. Hep A is not really serious.Yes, HBsAG test is for Hep B so you are not infected with Hep B.

So I could still have Hepatitis C even thought I am HBsAg negative, right?

I am scared I have Hep C because I was in jail recently and they did a medical and told me I had it. I went to the doctor and told her I wanted to get a hepatitis check. The result sheet said I am HBsAg negative. I told the doctor I wanted to be checked for all hepatitis viruses. I am 24 years old.
I have never injected needles or had sexual intercourse without protection.

question: I recently went to the doctor to get a full checkup. I told him I wanted to get checked for HIV, hepatitis, and sugar. All results came out fine, on the results sheet it said HBsAg is negative. Does this mean I have been cleared for all types of hepatitis viruses? Or do Hepatitis A and Hepatitis C have nothing to do with the HBsAg test.
title: HBsAg negative - is it possible to have HCV?
